text: Patricia Poblete Benett (6 June 1946 âˆ’ 31 March 2022) was a Chilean economist and politician. She was the Minister of Housing & Urbanism during the first government of Michelle Bachelet from 2006 until 2010. She was born in Temuco, Chile. Poblete died on 31 March 2022 in Santiago, Chile at the age of 75. ==References== Category:1946 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Chilean politicians Category:Chilean economists
title: Patricia Poblete
